item.title: Sensor Format Blind Test Results
item.author: mail@tahirhashmi.com (Tahir Hashmi)
item.description: The results of the Sensor Format Blind Test are out! I got a total of 13 responses, which is a bit too low for a full-blown, conclusive ranking analysis. We can, however, do some meaningful analysis if we ask simpler questions. To start with, “Is the photo from Format X the best?” To answer this question, we simply count the number of respondents who placed the photo from the given format as the best.
